name: String

methods.name: abbreviate
methods.description: Returns an abbreviated version of the String, of the specified length and with ellipses appended if the current String is longer than the specified length; otherwise, returns the original String without ellipses.

methods.name: abbreviate
methods.signature: public String abbreviate(Integer maxWidth, Integer offset)
methods.description: Returns an abbreviated version of the String, starting at the specified character offset and of the specified length. The returned String has ellipses appended at the start and the end if characters have been removed at these locations.

methods.name: capitalize
methods.description: Returns the current String with the first letter changed to title case.

methods.name: center
methods.description: Returns a version of the current String of the specified size padded with spaces on the left and right, so that it appears in the center. If the specified size is smaller than the current String size, the entire String is returned without added spaces.

methods.name: center
methods.signature: public String center(Integer size, String paddingString)
methods.description: Returns a version of the current String of the specified size padded with the specified String on the left and right, so that it appears in the center. If the specified size is smaller than the current String size, the entire String is returned without padding.

methods.name: charAt
methods.description: Returns the value of the character at the specified index.

methods.name: codePointAt
methods.description: Returns the Unicode code point value at the specified index.

methods.name: codePointBefore
methods.description: Returns the Unicode code point value that occurs before the specified index.

methods.name: codePointCount
methods.signature: public Integer codePointCount(Integer beginIndex, Integer endIndex)
methods.description: Returns the number of Unicode code points within the specified text range.

methods.name: compareTo
methods.description: Compares two strings lexicographically, based on the Unicode value of each character in the Strings.

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Returns true if and only if the String that called the method contains the specified sequence of characters in substring.

methods.name: containsAny
methods.description: Returns true if the current String contains any of the characters in the specified String; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: containsIgnoreCase
methods.description: Returns true if the current String contains the specified sequence of characters without regard to case; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: containsNone
methods.description: Returns true if the current String doesn’t contain any of the characters in the specified String; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: containsOnly
methods.description: Returns true if the current String contains characters only from the specified sequence of characters and not any other characters; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: containsWhitespace
methods.description: Returns true if the current String contains any white space characters; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: countMatches
methods.description: Returns the number of times the specified substring occurs in the current String.

methods.name: deleteWhitespace
methods.description: Returns a version of the current String with all white space characters removed.

methods.name: difference
methods.description: Returns the difference between the current String and the specified String.

methods.name: endsWith
methods.description: Returns true if the String that called the method ends with the specified suffix.

methods.name: endsWithIgnoreCase
methods.description: Returns true if the current String ends with the specified suffix; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Deprecated. This method is replaced by equals(stringOrId). Returns true if the passed-in string is not null and represents the same binary sequence of characters as the current string. Use this method to perform case-sensitive comparisons.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Returns true if the passed-in object is not null and represents the same binary sequence of characters as the current string. Use this method to compare a string to an object that represents a string or an ID.

methods.name: equalsIgnoreCase
methods.description: Returns true if the secondString is not null and represents the same sequence of characters as the String that called the method, ignoring case.

methods.name: escapeCsv
methods.description: Returns a String for a CSV column enclosed in double quotes, if required.

methods.name: escapeEcmaScript
methods.description: Escapes the characters in the String using EcmaScript String rules.   Signature   public String escapeEcmaScript()

methods.name: escapeHtml3
methods.description: Escapes the characters in a String using HTML 3.0 entities.   Signature   public String escapeHtml3()

methods.name: escapeHtml4
methods.description: Escapes the characters in a String using HTML 4.0 entities.   Signature   public String escapeHtml4()

methods.name: escapeJava
methods.description: Returns a String whose characters are escaped using Java String rules. Characters escaped include quotes and control characters, such as tab, backslash, and carriage return characters.

methods.name: escapeSingleQuotes
methods.description: Returns a String with the escape character (\) added before any single quotation marks in the String s.

methods.name: escapeUnicode
methods.description: Returns a String whose Unicode characters are escaped to a Unicode escape sequence.

methods.name: escapeXml
methods.description: Escapes the characters in a String using XML entities.   Signature public String escapeXml()

methods.name: format
methods.signature: public static String format(String stringToFormat, List<Object> formattingArguments)
methods.description: Treat the first argument as a pattern and return a string using the second argument for substitution and formatting. The substitution and formatting are the same as apex:outputText and the Java MessageFormat class. Non-string types in the second argument’s List are implicitly converted to strings, respecting the toString() method overrides that exist on the type.

methods.name: fromCharArray
methods.description: Returns a String from the values of the list of integers.   Signature public static String fromCharArray(List<Integer> charArray)

methods.name: getChars
methods.description: Returns an array of character values that represent the characters in this string.

methods.name: getCommonPrefix
methods.description: Returns the initial sequence of characters as a String that is common to all the specified Strings.

methods.name: getLevenshteinDistance
methods.description: Returns the Levenshtein distance between the current String and the specified String.

methods.name: getLevenshteinDistance
methods.signature: public Integer getLevenshteinDistance(String stringToCompare, Integer threshold)
methods.description: Returns the Levenshtein distance between the current String and the specified String if it is less than or equal than the given threshold; otherwise, returns -1.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this string.   Signature public Integer hashCode()

methods.name: indexOf
methods.description: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified substring. If the substring does not occur, this method returns -1.

methods.name: indexOf
methods.signature: public Integer indexOf(String substring, Integer index)
methods.description: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified substring from the point of the given index. If the substring does not occur, this method returns -1.

methods.name: indexOfAny
methods.description: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of any character specified in the substring. If none of the characters occur, returns -1.

methods.name: indexOfAnyBut
methods.description: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of a character that is not in the specified substring. Otherwise, returns -1.

methods.name: indexOfChar
methods.description: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the character that corresponds to the specified character value.

methods.name: indexOfChar
methods.signature: public Integer indexOfChar(Integer character, Integer startIndex)
methods.description: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the character that corresponds to the specified character value, starting from the specified index.

methods.name: indexOfDifference
methods.description: Returns the zero-based index of the character where the current String begins to differ from the specified String.

methods.name: indexOfIgnoreCase
methods.description: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified substring without regard to case. If the substring does not occur, this method returns -1.

methods.name: indexOfIgnoreCase
methods.signature: public Integer indexOfIgnoreCase(String substring, Integer startPosition)
methods.description: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified substring from the point of index i, without regard to case. If the substring does not occur, this method returns -1.

methods.name: isAllLowerCase
methods.description: Returns true if all characters in the current String are lowercase; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isAllUpperCase
methods.description: Returns true if all characters in the current String are uppercase; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isAlpha
methods.description: Returns true if all characters in the current String are Unicode letters only; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isAlphaSpace
methods.description: Returns true if all characters in the current String are Unicode letters or spaces only; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isAlphanumeric
methods.description: Returns true if all characters in the current String are Unicode letters or numbers only; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isAlphanumericSpace
methods.description: Returns true if all characters in the current String are Unicode letters, numbers, or spaces only; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isAsciiPrintable
methods.description: Returns true if the current String contains only ASCII printable characters; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isBlank
methods.description: Returns true if the specified String is white space, empty (''), or null; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isEmpty
methods.description: Returns true if the specified String is empty ('') or null; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isNotBlank
methods.description: Returns true if the specified String is not whitespace, not empty (''), and not null; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isNotEmpty
methods.description: Returns true if the specified String is not empty ('') and not null; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isNumeric
methods.description: Returns true if the current String contains only Unicode digits; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isNumericSpace
methods.description: Returns true if the current String contains only Unicode digits or spaces; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isWhitespace
methods.description: Returns true if the current String contains only white space characters or is empty; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: join
methods.signature: public static String join(Object iterableObj, String separator)
methods.description: Joins the elements of the specified iterable object, such as a List, into a single String separated by the specified separator.

methods.name: lastIndexOf
methods.description: Returns the index of the last occurrence of the specified substring. If the substring does not occur, this method returns -1.

methods.name: lastIndexOf
methods.signature: public Integer lastIndexOf(String substring, Integer endPosition)
methods.description: Returns the index of the last occurrence of the specified substring, starting from the character at index 0 and ending at the specified index.

methods.name: lastIndexOfChar
methods.description: Returns the index of the last occurrence of the character that corresponds to the specified character value.

methods.name: lastIndexOfChar
methods.signature: public Integer lastIndexOfChar(Integer character, Integer endIndex)
methods.description: Returns the index of the last occurrence of the character that corresponds to the specified character value, starting from the specified index.

methods.name: lastIndexOfIgnoreCase
methods.description: Returns the index of the last occurrence of the specified substring regardless of case.

methods.name: lastIndexOfIgnoreCase
methods.signature: public Integer lastIndexOfIgnoreCase(String substring, Integer endPosition)
methods.description: Returns the index of the last occurrence of the specified substring regardless of case, starting from the character at index 0 and ending at the specified index.

methods.name: left
methods.description: Returns the leftmost characters of the current String of the specified length.

methods.name: leftPad
methods.description: Returns the current String padded with spaces on the left and of the specified length.

methods.name: leftPad
methods.description: Returns the current String padded with String padStr on the left and of the specified length.   Signature public String leftPad(Integer length, String padStr)

methods.name: length
methods.description: Returns the number of 16-bit Unicode characters contained in the String.

methods.name: mid
methods.signature: public String mid(Integer startIndex, Integer length)
methods.description: Returns a new String that begins with the character at the specified zero-based startIndex with the number of characters specified by length.

methods.name: normalizeSpace
methods.description: Returns the current String with leading, trailing, and repeating white space characters removed.

methods.name: offsetByCodePoints
methods.signature: public Integer offsetByCodePoints(Integer index, Integer codePointOffset)
methods.description: Returns the index of the Unicode code point that is offset by the specified number of code points, starting from the given index.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes all occurrences of the specified substring and returns the String result.

methods.name: removeEnd
methods.description: Removes the specified substring only if it occurs at the end of the String.

methods.name: removeEndIgnoreCase
methods.description: Removes the specified substring only if it occurs at the end of the String using a case-insensitive match.

methods.name: removeStart
methods.description: Removes the specified substring only if it occurs at the beginning of the String.

methods.name: removeStartIgnoreCase
methods.description: Removes the specified substring only if it occurs at the beginning of the String using a case-insensitive match.

methods.name: repeat
methods.description: Returns the current String repeated the specified number of times.

methods.name: repeat
methods.signature: public String repeat(String separator, Integer numberOfTimes)
methods.description: Returns the current String repeated the specified number of times using the specified separator to separate the repeated Strings.

methods.name: replace
methods.signature: public String replace(String target, String replacement)
methods.description: Replaces each substring of a string that matches the literal target sequence target with the specified literal replacement sequence replacement.

methods.name: replaceAll
methods.signature: public String replaceAll(String regExp, String replacement)
methods.description: Replaces each substring of a string that matches the regular expression regExp with the replacement sequence replacement.

methods.name: replaceFirst
methods.signature: public String replaceFirst(String regExp, String replacement)
methods.description: Replaces the first substring of a string that matches the regular expression regExp with the replacement sequence replacement.

methods.name: reverse
methods.description: Returns a String with all the characters reversed.   Signature public String reverse()

methods.name: right
methods.description: Returns the rightmost characters of the current String of the specified length.

methods.name: rightPad
methods.description: Returns the current String padded with spaces on the right and of the specified length.

methods.name: rightPad
methods.description: Returns the current String padded with String padStr on the right and of the specified length.   Signature public String rightPad(Integer length, String padStr)

methods.name: split
methods.description: Returns a list that contains each substring of the String that is terminated by either the regular expression regExp or the end of the String.

methods.name: split
methods.signature: public String[] split(String regExp, Integer limit)
methods.description: Returns a list that contains each substring of the String that is terminated by either the regular expression regExp or the end of the String.

methods.name: splitByCharacterType
methods.description: Splits the current String by character type and returns a list of contiguous character groups of the same type as complete tokens.

methods.name: splitByCharacterTypeCamelCase
methods.description: Splits the current String by character type and returns a list of contiguous character groups of the same type as complete tokens, with the following exception: the uppercase character, if any, immediately preceding a lowercase character token belongs to the following character token rather than to the preceding.

methods.name: startsWith
methods.description: Returns true if the String that called the method begins with the specified prefix.

methods.name: startsWithIgnoreCase
methods.description: Returns true if the current String begins with the specified prefix regardless of the prefix case.

methods.name: stripHtmlTags
methods.description: Removes HTML markup and returns plain text.   Signature   public String stripHtmlTags(String htmlInput)

methods.name: substring
methods.description: Returns a new String that begins with the character at the specified zero-based startIndex and extends to the end of the String.

methods.name: substring
methods.signature: public String substring(Integer startIndex, Integer endIndex)
methods.description: Returns a new String that begins with the character at the specified zero-based startIndex and extends to the character at endIndex - 1.

methods.name: substringAfter
methods.description: Returns the substring that occurs after the first occurrence of the specified separator.

methods.name: substringAfterLast
methods.description: Returns the substring that occurs after the last occurrence of the specified separator.

methods.name: substringBefore
methods.description: Returns the substring that occurs before the first occurrence of the specified separator.

methods.name: substringBeforeLast
methods.description: Returns the substring that occurs before the last occurrence of the specified separator.

methods.name: substringBetween
methods.description: Returns the substring that occurs between two instances of the specified tag String.

methods.name: substringBetween
methods.signature: public String substringBetween(String open, String close)
methods.description: Returns the substring that occurs between the two specified Strings.

methods.name: swapCase
methods.description: Swaps the case of all characters and returns the resulting String by using the default (English US) locale.

methods.name: toLowerCase
methods.description: Converts all of the characters in the String to lowercase using the rules of the default (English US) locale.

methods.name: toLowerCase
methods.description: Converts all of the characters in the String to lowercase using the rules of the specified locale.

methods.name: toUpperCase
methods.description: Converts all of the characters in the String to uppercase using the rules of the default (English US) locale.

methods.name: toUpperCase
methods.description: Converts all of the characters in the String to the uppercase using the rules of the specified locale.

methods.name: trim
methods.description: Returns a copy of the string that no longer contains any leading or trailing white space characters.

methods.name: uncapitalize
methods.description: Returns the current String with the first letter in lowercase.   Signature public String uncapitalize()

methods.name: unescapeCsv
methods.description: Returns a String representing an unescaped CSV column.   Signature public String unescapeCsv()

methods.name: unescapeEcmaScript
methods.description: Unescapes any EcmaScript literals found in the String.   Signature public String unescapeEcmaScript()

methods.name: unescapeHtml3
methods.description: Unescapes the characters in a String using HTML 3.0 entities.   Signature public String unescapeHtml3()

methods.name: unescapeHtml4
methods.description: Unescapes the characters in a String using HTML 4.0 entities.   Signature public String unescapeHtml4()

methods.name: unescapeJava
methods.description: Returns a String whose Java literals are unescaped. Literals unescaped include escape sequences for quotes (\\") and control characters, such as tab (\\t), and carriage return (\\n).

methods.name: unescapeUnicode
methods.description: Returns a String whose escaped Unicode characters are unescaped.   Signature public String unescapeUnicode()

methods.name: unescapeXml
methods.description: Unescapes the characters in a String using XML entities.   Signature public String unescapeXml()

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Returns a String that represents the specified Date in the standard “yyyy-MM-dd” format.

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Returns a String that represents the specified Datetime in the standard “yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss” format for the local time zone.

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Returns a String that represents the specified Decimal.   Signature public static String valueOf(Decimal decimalToConvert)

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Returns a String that represents the specified Double.   Signature public static String valueOf(Double doubleToConvert)

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Returns a String that represents the specified Integer.   Signature public static String valueOf(Integer integerToConvert)

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Returns a String that represents the specified Long.   Signature public static String valueOf(Long longToConvert)

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the specified object argument.

methods.name: valueOfGmt
methods.description: Returns a String that represents the specified Datetime in the standard “yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss” format for the GMT time zone.

description: Contains methods for the String primitive data type.
